questionTexts.text: How well do we understand what your company actually needs from us?
questionTexts.help: Do you think Mayflower knows what your business needs? Does Mayflower understand your business goals? How well does our work reflect your ideas?
How well does Mayflower handle your input? How good do we communicate? How effective do we reflect and improve on problems?
This is what you commissioned us to do - our core tasks and services for you as defined in our contract.

questionTexts.text: What are the essentials we have to deliver?
questionTexts.help: What are the must-have results you need from us? What would be critical if
questionTexts.placeholder: Scrum Master, NixOS consulting, Agile Coaching, ...

questionTexts.text: What should we deliver more of?
questionTexts.help: Which of the skills and competencies we're already using in your project do you value most? What are we already doing, but should put more focus on?
What excites you? What would your company benefit from additionally? How could our services assist your company further?
questionTexts.placeholder: NixOS workshops, Microservices workshop, Kanban coaching, ...

questionTexts.text: What should we avoid to do in the future?
questionTexts.help: What don't you need? Where do we err? What should we stop? As in: 'Really, people. Stop it NOW'?
questionTexts.placeholder: Remote Sprint Retrospective, Calling our PO instead of mailing, ...

questionTexts.text: What competencies and abilities should we acquire?
questionTexts.help: What do you need from us that we are missing so far? Are there tools or technologies you would like us to use? Should we level up on some soft skills?
We have calculated a suggestion for our next feedback meeting, based on the interval rule that you have set in your profile. Adjust as needed!
Which tasks should we explicitly work on until the next feedback date?

questionTexts.text: How likely is it that you would recommend our company/product to a friend or colleague?
questionTexts.help: We use this to calculate our overall Net Promoter Score and determine how good we serve our customers. Getting a 9+ rating really excites us - it means you love what we do and we did our job right.
